Title: AI use cases in Microsoft Teams Integrated Contact Center | ODSP1465
Description:
In this session we discuss how to improve customer service using AI with a Microsoft Teams Integrated Contact Center. We demo 4 specific use cases: Digital Assistant IVR, AI transfer assistant, suggested resources based on call context, and AI Agent checklist. This gives some real-world options to enhance customer services and assist your agents in the contact center.
